keyword: how many calories in a candy cane
title: How Many Calories in a Candy Cane?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a candy cane, plus carbs, sugars, and other nutrients based on a standard size, with tweaks and FAQs for holiday treats.
h1: How Many Calories in a Candy Cane?
assumptions: Standard holiday peppermint candy cane, about 14 g, hard candy style, no fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flavor, and ingredients; larger or flavored varieties differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical candy cane contains about 50 calories, primarily from sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a candy cane?
faqs.a: About 50 calories for a standard 14 g peppermint candy cane.

faqs.q: Are candy canes high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, nearly all 13 g carbs are sugars per candy cane.

faqs.q: Do candy canes have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein or fat; 0 g each in a standard one.

faqs.q: How do mini candy canes compare?
faqs.a: Mini sizes have about 25 calories, half of a full one.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in a candy cane?
faqs.a: Very low, around 5 mg per standard candy cane.
